scripts.test: eslint index.js test && mocha --reporter spec && if-node-version '>=8' npm run test-tsd && if-node-version '<8' npm run test-tsd-old
scripts.test-tsd-old: echo 'Cannot test TypeScript definitions because Node version is too old'
